about_the_game:
hello Seeing this, do you want to become an anime cute girl, Zhengtai to become a virtual UP master, virtual anchor or Vtuber?
very simple! Let's start right away with this "FaceWorldPro" (*^_^*)

"FaceWorldPro" is an application that only needs ordinary cameras and ordinary CPUs to perform facial expressions and motion capture to operate prefabricated or custom 3D avatars. Five-finger gesture recognition and half-body whole-body motion recognition that do not require motion capture equipment and depth cameras that only require ordinary cameras will also be developed soon. It has a wide range of application scenarios such as live broadcast, scenario animation, video and film creation, education, web conference, video chat, KTV, etc.
Compared with similar software, it supports weak light sources, face shielding such as glasses or even masks, and solves the problem of obvious lag and jitter during motion capture. Five-finger gesture recognition, half-body and full-body motion capture only rely on ordinary cameras without additional professional equipment.
No need for joint callouts out of the box!

hello Seeing this, do you want to become an anime cute girl, Zhengtai to become a virtual UP master, virtual anchor or Vtuber?
very simple! Let's start right away with this "FaceWorldPro" (*^_^*)

"FaceWorldPro" is an application that only needs ordinary cameras and ordinary CPUs to perform facial expressions and motion capture to operate prefabricated or custom 3D avatars. Five-finger gesture recognition and half-body whole-body motion recognition that do not require motion capture equipment and depth cameras that only require ordinary cameras will also be developed soon. It has a wide range of application scenarios such as live broadcast, scenario animation, video and film creation, education, web conference, video chat, KTV, etc.
Compared with similar software, it supports weak light sources, face shielding such as glasses or even masks, and solves the problem of obvious lag and jitter during motion capture. Five-finger gesture recognition, half-body and full-body motion capture only rely on ordinary cameras without additional professional equipment.
No need for joint callouts out of the box!
name: FaceWorld Pro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: i3-530
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 集成显卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 普通声卡
  • Additional Notes: 无
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: i5-10400/F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 普通声卡
  • Additional Notes: 无
